description:
Zichain provides a suite of modules for cryptocurrency financial services. Our infrastructure solutions are tailored for managing digital assets: from retail trading to institutional wealth management.

Zichain modules unleash the potential of fintech and maximize advantages of blockchain, big data, and AI. Our research and development activity in blockchain is aimed to eliminate a counterparty risk by building infrastructure for decentralized storage of assets. The fintech services are based on the best practices of the traditional financial world and offer the turnkey trading solutions to retail and institutional participants of the cryptocurrency market. Big Data & AI module becomes your digital financial advisor in the crypto world by delivering comprehensive news and market data along with suggesting proper investment decisions.
name: Zichain
